item.title: Videography Shoot for Non-profit Organization | Detroit, Michigan Area - Upwork
item.description:
We need a talented videographer to shoot at their a couple locations in Detroit — Near the Boston Edison District.

Estimated Project Time: 4-6 hours for two shoot locations.

We need a professional that can step in and take the lead from a video strategy and filming perspective.

If you are interested, please submit your proposal and we will set up a video meeting to meet. This will allow us to hear more about your background and provide additional details for the shoot.

Once accepted and hired, we can share you with all brand details and assets ‘

We're a cause-driven digital marketing agency based out of Detroit.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$55.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 03:40 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Video Production, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Videography, Video Production, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
